title: Did Bernie Sanders Propose a Bill Forcing Christian Office Holders to Wear a Scarlet Cross?
subtitle: A  piece inspired by the senator's antagonistic questioning of Trump appointee Russell Vought says Sanders proposed a "Hateful Bigot Identification Act."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Senator Bernie Sanders proposed a bill requiring all Christians who hold public office to wear a scarlet cross identifying them as "hateful bigots."
